description: This file defines a Flutter widget called BillDetailsCard, which displays billing details including item price, discounts, delivery charges, taxes, total charges, and provides UI elements for applying coupons and proceeding to checkout. It also includes a helper widget _RowLine for layout.

classes.name: BillDetailsCard
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays billing information and actions for a shopping cart.

classes.name: _RowLine
classes.description: A helper stateless widget that displays a row with a label and value, used in billing details layout.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for BillDetailsCard.

methods.name: _RowLine
methods.description: Builds a row with label and value for the billing details.
